docs.title: Welcome to the Faded's
docs.text: This is a personal website for learning and sharing, and I am eagerly looking forward to you to contribute. In this website, I will share my learning notes and resources in CS and other courses that I'm used to be struggled for or now struggling for, and I will also share my personal projects and inspirations.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml                # The configuration file.
.github/
    workflows/
        build.yml
docs/
    index.md              # The documentation homepage.
    tutorials.md          # How to build your own simple Private Page.
    about.md              # Background information.
site/                     # The static site.

docs.title: About This Website
docs.text: This is a personal website for learning and sharing, and I am eagerly looking forward to you to contribute. In this website, I will share my learning notes and resources in CS and other courses that I'm used to be struggled for or now struggling for, and I will also share my personal projects and inspirations. Columns are as follows: 1. Computer System I 2. Computer System II 3. FDS 4. ADS 5. Discreted Math 6. Projects & Inspirations 7. ...

docs.title: How to build your own simple Private Page
Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
